The estimated rate family (PRO,FAM,GOV

Room type code, 3 character identifier of the room.
The first character identifies the room type category. 
The second numeric character identifies the number of beds. 
The third character identifies the bed type. 
There is a special case where ROH is returned, this value stands for Run Of House

A self link to the object. Use this to refresh the Offer price, schema: {"type": "string", "example": "https://test.travel.api.amadeus.com/v2/shopping/hotel-offers/63A93695B58821ABB0EC2B33FE9FAB24D72BF34B1BD7D707293763D8D9378FC3"}

currency Code apply to all elements of the price
Check-in From time limit in ISO-8601 format [http://www.w3.org/TR/xmlschema-2/#time], schema: {"type": "string", "example": "13:00:00"}

Specifies if the tax applies per occupant or per room
  - PER_OCCUPANT
  - PER_PRODUCT
Unique identifier of this offer. Might be valid for a temporary period only, schema: {"type": "string", "minLength": 2, "maxLength": 100}
Check-out Until time limit in ISO-8601 format [http://www.w3.org/TR/xmlschema-2/#time], schema: {"type": "string", "example": "11:00:00"}
Percentage of the commission paid to the travel seller. Value is between 0 and 100
Number of beds in the room (1-9

Represents the deadline after which the penalty applies. DateTime is in ISO 8601 [https://www.w3.org/TR/NOTE-datetime].
Example: 2010-08-14T12:00:00+01:00
Example: 2010-08-14T12:00:00Z
Example: 2010-08-14T12:00:00-01:00
The value is expressed in the hotel local time zone, with the added time zone difference. So you can compute the deadline in UTC(GMT
